messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: On February 15, DET. A. B. Anderson was informed of multiple break-ins at the Riverside Condominiums. Primary informants were Mr. Sullivan, a resident, and Ms. Hayes, the building security head. FORWARD COPY TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION. INFORMANT DOCS. Lt. C. D. Edwards - OPERATIONS Det. Anderson, Jr. .. INVESTIGATIONS. Detective E. F. Griffin and Detective G. H. Holmes were assigned to examine the scene. PARKER 23:35 Break-Ins Mr. Sullivan reported missing valuables, while Ms. Hayes shared CCTV footage. Footage. Technician Liam reviewed the videos. CONTINUED FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION 3- STATUS [CHECK ONE] Det. Anderson Jr, Det. Griffin, Det. Holmes OPERATIONS Lt. Edwards INFORMANT Hayes, Patricia 81 River Road, Riverside, Florida 198-885. 94230. PARKER 23:35 Break-Ins By 2:10 AM, Detectives Anderson, Griffin, and Holmes, directed by Lieutenant Edwards, identified a masked suspect using the basement entry. Captain I. J. Kennedy recommended increased patrols. Sergeant K. L. Mitchell and Sergeant M. N. Olson checked for similar incidents in nearby buildings. By 4:05 AM, two other buildings reported similar break-ins. FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION 3- STATUS [CHECK ONE] Det. Anderson Jr, Det. Griffin, Det. Holmes OPERATIONS Lt. Edwards AFFIDAVIT - Break-Ins Report 1) List of Stolen Items 2) Witness Statements 3) F.I.R. 4) CCTV Recordings 5) Building Access Logs (6) Other Details LINE UP INFO ASSISTANT CHIEF DEPUTY IN CHARGE R. Wilson R.C.P.D. 31.125 P72 3375 Sullivan, JAMES NAME: ADDRESS: TELEPHONE: 185-3675 DETECTIVE: A. ANDERSON ITEM: 72-5500- 108 CRIME: 23:35 IDENTIFICATION NUMBER 84315 - CONFIRMED Jane Doe DATE 8/20/24 FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION CONTINUED.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: DET. A. B. Anderson  Officer Context: On February 15, DET. A. B. Anderson was informed of multiple break-ins at the Riverside Condominiums. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Lt. C. D. Edwards  Officer Context: Lt. C. D. Edwards - OPERATIONS Officer Role: Lieutenant Officer Name: Detective E. F. Griffin  Officer Context: Detective E. F. Griffin and Detective G. H. Holmes were assigned to examine the scene. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective G. H. Holmes  Officer Context: Detective E. F. Griffin and Detective G. H. Holmes were assigned to examine the scene. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Technician Liam  Officer Context: Footage. Technician Liam reviewed the videos. Officer Role: Technician (from the Crime Lab) Officer Name: Detective Anderson  Officer Context: By 2:10 AM, Detectives Anderson, Griffin, and Holmes, directed by Lieutenant Edwards, identified a masked suspect. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective Griffin  Officer Context: By 2:10 AM, Detectives Anderson, Griffin, and Holmes, directed by Lieutenant Edwards, identified a masked suspect. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective Holmes  Officer Context: By 2:10 AM, Detectives Anderson, Griffin, and Holmes, directed by Lieutenant Edwards, identified a masked suspect. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Captain I. J. Kennedy  Officer Context: Captain I. J. Kennedy recommended increased patrols. Officer Role: Captain Officer Name: Sergeant K. L. Mitchell  Officer Context: Sergeant K. L. Mitchell and Sergeant M. N. Olson checked for similar incidents in nearby buildings. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Sergeant M. N. Olson Officer Context: Sergeant K. L. Mitchell and Sergeant M. N. Olson checked for similar incidents in nearby buildings. Officer Role: Sergeant
